level.text: If an antenna equipment cabinet or shelter is provided on the ground, it shall be subject to the following:
It shall be regulated as an accessory building subject to any applicable criteria within each zone district; and
It shall harmonize with the main structure in architectural character, material, and color.
If an antenna equipment cabinet or shelter is provided on the roof of a building or structure, it shall be erected or enlarged subject to the following:
It shall be set back from all exterior walls a distance at least equal to its height above the roof upon which it is located;
It shall harmonize with the main structure in architectural character, material, and color;
It shall not exceed eighteen feet six inches (18 ft. 6 in.) in height above the roof upon which it is located; and
It shall be placed only on a roof of a principal structure and may not be permitted on a roof of any other roof structure or penthouse.
The Board of Zoning Adjustment may waive one or more of the requirements of ยง 2715.2 for good cause shown in accordance with ยง 3104.
